title: KALUBOWITIYANA TEA FACTORY ACHIEVES EQUAL ALL TIME RECORD  PRICE AT E-AUCTION IN SRI LANKA
body_lines: An equal all-time record price of Rs.2,100.00 per kg was recorded in the low grown CTC category PF1 grade manufactured by Kalubowitiyana Tea Factory, at this week’s e- Auction held on 13 th /15 th June 2022. This is an excellent achievement for which we offer our best wishes to the team Kalubowitiyana Tea Factory.

Kalubowitiyana Tea Factory is comes under the purview of Kalubowitiyana Tea Factories Ltd. The team at Kalubowitiyana tea factory continue to consistently produce high quality teas enabling them to obtain attractive prices at the Colombo tea auctions.
This line was purchased by M/s Uniworld Teas (Pvt) Ltd and Bartleet Produce Marketing (Pvt) Ltd are the tea brokers marketing the produce.
